sen.j: 大田皇女（おおたのひめみこ、生年不詳 - 天智天皇6年（667年）2月 (旧暦)頃）は、飛鳥時代の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Princess Ota (year of birth unknown, died February, 667 [according to the lunar calendar]) was one of the Imperial family members during the Asuka Period.
The Imperial Princess Ota (year of birth unknown - c. March, 667) was one of the Imperial Family members during the Asuka period.
sen.cmt: 天智天皇6年（667年）2月（旧暦）→西暦667年3月と修正しました。カッコ内を修正しました。the を補い、Imperial family→Imperial Family,Period→period と修正しました。
sen.e: The Imperial Princess Ota (year of birth unknown - c. March, 667) was one of the Imperial Family members during the Asuka period.

sen.j: 父は天智天皇で、母は蘇我倉山田石川麻呂の娘・遠智娘。
sen.e: Her father was Emperor Tenchi (Tenji), and her mother was Ochi no iratsume, a daughter of SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro.
Her father was the Emperor Tenchi (Tenji), and her mother was Ochi no iratsume, a daughter of SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro.
Her father was the Emperor Tenchi (Tenji), and her mother was Ochi no iratsume, a daughter of SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro.

sen.j: 同母妹に持統天皇、同母弟に建皇子がいる。
sen.e: She had an younger sister-uterine, Empress Jito, and an younger brother-uterine, Takeru no miko.
She had an younger sister-uterine, the Empress Jito, and an younger brother-uterine, Takeru no miko.
She had an younger sister-uterine, the Empress Jito, and an younger brother-uterine, Takeru no miko.

sen.j: 妹の野讚良皇女とともに天武天皇の妃となり、大来皇女、大津皇子を生むが、夫の即位を見ずに若くして死ぬ。
sen.e: Princess Ota, as well as her younger sister, Uno no Sarara, married Emperor Tenmu, and gave birth to Oku no himemiko (Princess Oku) and Prince Otsu, but she died young before the enthronement of her husband.

The Princess Ota, as well as her younger sister, Uno no Sarara, married the Emperor Tenmu, and gave birth to Oku no himemiko (the Princess Oku) and the Prince Otsu, but she died young before the enthronement of her husband.

The Princess Ota, as well as her younger sister, Uno no Sarara, married the Emperor Tenmu, and gave birth to Oku no himemiko (the Princess Oku) and the Prince Otsu, but she died young before the enthronement of her husband.

sen.j: 当時大伯皇女は7歳、大津皇子は5歳で、母方の祖父である天智天皇に引き取られたという。
sen.e: When she died, Princess Oku was seven years old and Prince Otsu five, so both were fostered out to Emperor Tenchi (Tenji), their maternal grandfather.
When she died, the Princess Oku was seven years old and the Prince Otsu was five, so both were fostered out to the Emperor Tenchi (Tenji), their maternal grandfather.
sen.cmt: the, was を補いました。
sen.e: When she died, the Princess Oku was seven years old and the Prince Otsu was five, so both were fostered out to the Emperor Tenchi (Tenji), their maternal grandfather.

sen.j: 祖母皇極天皇、叔母間人皇女（天智の妹、孝徳天皇皇后）とともに葬られた。
sen.e: The body of Princess Ota was buried together with her grandmother, Empress Kogyoku and her aunt, Hashihito no Himemiko (a younger sister of Emperor Tenchi [Tenji] and also an empress of Emperor Kotoku).
She was buried together with her grandmother, the Empress Kogyoku and her aunt, Hashihito no Himemiko (a younger sister of the Emperor Tenchi [Tenji] and also the empress of the Emperor Kotoku).
sen.cmt: The body of the Princess Ota→She と修正しました。the を補いました。an→the と修正しました。
sen.e: She was buried together with her grandmother, the Empress Kogyoku and her aunt, Hashihito no Himemiko (a younger sister of the Emperor Tenchi [Tenji] and also the empress of the Emperor Kotoku).

sen.j: 同母妹の野讚良皇女がのちに皇后となったことからみても、長生きしていれば天武の皇后となるはずの妃であった。
sen.e: Guessing from the fact that her younger sister-uterine, Princess Uno no Sarara became an empress later, if Princess Ota had lived longer, she would have become an empress of Tenmu.
Guessing from the fact that her younger sister-uterine, the Princess Uno no Sarara became an empress later, if the Princess Ota had lived longer, she would have become the empress of Tenmu.
sen.cmt: the を補いました。スペースを修正しました。an→the と修正しました。
sen.e: Guessing from the fact that her younger sister-uterine, the Princess Uno no Sarara became an empress later, if the Princess Ota had lived longer, she would have become the empress of Tenmu.

sen.j: 大津皇子にとってこの母を早くに亡くしたことは、皇后所生の草壁皇子との後の対立を含め、人生に大きな影響を与えたと思われる。
sen.e: Given lots of incidents in Prince Otsu's life including the confrontation with Prince Kusakabe (a son of Empress Uno no Sarara), early death of his mother must have had a great influence on his life.
It is assumed that the loss of his mother in his early age affected the Prince Otsu's life significantly, including the confrontation against the Prince Kusakabe later on.
sen.cmt: 文脈に応じて修正しました。
sen.e: It is assumed that the loss of his mother in his early age affected the Prince Otsu's life significantly, including the confrontation against the Prince Kusakabe later on.
